definition: Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
west
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: At West Ham he was thought of as the rosebud that never properly flowered.
sentences.chinese: 在西汉姆他被认为是一个尚未开放的花蕾。

sentences.english: West Ham have admitted that they fielded players illegally.
sentences.chinese: 西汉姆承认他们是非法引进球员。

sentences.english: The Museum of the Western Han Dynasty Mausoleum of the Nanyue King is worth visiting.
sentences.chinese: 西汉南越王博物馆值得看看。

sentences.english: Xiu Han Dynasty by Wang Mang to kill this golden rooster lead the way by which name.
sentences.chinese: 因西汉末年刘秀遭王莽追杀到此金鸡引路而名。

sentences.english: Liverpool are set to outbid West Ham United for Lazio midfielder Valon Behrami.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦在对贝赫拉米的出价上击败了西汉姆联。

sentences.english: According to the historical record, the custom of tea-drinking occurred in the Wesrern Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 据史料记载，西汉时期已经有了饮茶的习俗。

sentences.english: Yes, this is the tomb of West Han Dynasty's Guangling State Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 没错，这里是西汉广陵国王的陵墓。

sentences.english: The exploration of the South China Sea Silk Road began in the Western Han Peniod.
sentences.chinese: 南海丝绸之路的开辟，始于西汉时期。

sentences.english: During the Western Han Dynasty, who was twice sent on a diplomatic mission to the western territories?
sentences.chinese: 西汉年间，曾两度出使西域的是以下哪一位？

sentences.english: This is a masterpiece of Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-24AD) bronze craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: “透光镜”是西汉青铜工艺的精品。

sentences.english: Baoding is a city with a history dating back to the Western Han Dynasty .
sentences.chinese: 保定是一个城市的历史可追溯至西汉时期。

sentences.english: The first section elaborated the Western Han Dynasty time dance art development vein.
sentences.chinese: 第一节论述了西汉时期舞蹈艺术的发展脉络。

sentences.english: Emperor Gaozu exerted various influence on the literature of Western Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 汉高祖对西汉文学的影响是多方面的。

sentences.english: Liu Bang established Western Han Dynasty, and he consolidated the centralized feudal state.
sentences.chinese: 刘邦建立了西汉，巩固了中央集权的封建国家。

sentences.english: Western Han Dynasty particular period oneself consciousness of Chinese clan.
sentences.chinese: 西汉时期汉民族的自我意识。

sentences.english: The emperors of past dynasties have imitated the example since the appearance of it in the Western Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 据文献记载，铁券出现于西汉，魏晋以降多有颁赐。

definition: Eastern or later Han dynasty, 25-220
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Han Dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Qin Dynasty (221-207 BC)
Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
Western Jin dynasty (265-316)
posthumous name of the first Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦 (256 or 247-195 BC), reigned 202-195 BC
Emperor Wu of the Han dynasty (141-87 BC)
Western Zhou (1027-771 BC)
Former Han dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 西漢|西汉[Xi1 Han4], Western Han dynasty
Emperor Wen of Han (202-157 BC), fourth Han emperor, personal name Liu Heng 劉恆|刘恒[Liu2 Heng2], reigned 180-157 BC
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
early years
Emperor Xuan (91-48 BC) of the Former Han Dynasty, reigned 74-48 BC
